GeochemXYDiagram.name: Porphyry Cu Prospectivity Eu(n)/Eu vs SiO2 wt%
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Plot of Europium norm (Eu(n)/Eu) against SiO2 as indicators for plagioclase fractionation in igenous rocks. Normalisation values from Sun and McDonough (1989).
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Richards et al., 2012, High Sr/Y Magmas Reflect Arc Maturity, High Magmatic Water Content, and Porphyry Cu +/- Mo +/- Au Potential: Examples from the Tethyan Arcs of Central and Eastern Iran and Western Pakistan, Economic Geology, v.107, pp. 310, Fig 9a
